NK036(chi)001:0: sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gsum gyi rgyud ces bya
NK036(chi)001:1: ba bzhugs so man ngag go gcig pa rgya gar
NK036(chi)001:2: skad du su ka ma ta a la ya de
NK036(chi)001:3: ka ra a ti ta bud+d+ha tan+t+ra na mah bod
NK036(chi)001:4: skad du dga' ldan gnas su sangs rgyas kyi zhal
NK036(chi)001:5: chems dang po'i rgyud ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das
NK036(chi)001:6: kun rig dpal gyi dpal rnam par snang mdzad la
NK036(chi)001:7: phyag 'tshal lo bcom ldan 'das drug pa rdo rje
NK036(chi)001:8: 'chang chen po dga' ldan lha'i gnas bkod pa tshad
NK036(chi)001:9: med pa'i gzhal yas khang na byang chub sems dpa'
NK036(chi)001:10: 'jam dpal dbyangs dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang
NK036(chi)001:11: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa bskal pa bzang
NK036(chi)001:12: po'i byang chub sems dpa' stong dang bcas pa seng
NK036(chi)001:13: ge lta bu'i gzigs stangs kyis bzhugs so gzhan yang
NK036(chi)001:14: shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba dang lho dpal dang
NK036(chi)001:15: ldan pa'i zhing khams dang nub bde ba can gyi
NK036(chi)001:16: zhing khams dang byang las rab grub pa'i zhing khams
NK036(chi)001:17: kyi byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig rnams
NK036(chi)001:18: kyang der mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas mchod
NK036(chi)001:19: nas seng ge lta bu'i gzigs stangs kyis bzhugs so
NK036(chi)001:20: gzhan yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha' 'gro
NK036(chi)001:21: pad+ma mkha' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro rnams kyis mchod
NK036(chi)001:22: pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa mchod nas seng ge
NK036(chi)001:23: lta bu'i gzigs stangs kyis 'khod do de nas bcom
NK036(chi)001:24: ldan 'das chos nyid mngon sum du snang ba zhes
NK036(chi)001:25: bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so snyoms
NK036(chi)001:26: par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
NK036(chi)001:27: gnyis nas 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi rdo rje
NK036(chi)001:28: lu gu rgyud kyi thig le dang thig phran dang
NK036(chi)001:29: phra ba dang rab tu phra ba shin tu phra
NK036(chi)001:30: ba dang rab tu 'gyur ba nyid dang yang ba
NK036(chi)001:31: dang rnam par 'phrig pa dang 'khyug pa dang tshom
NK036(chi)001:32: bu dang mu khyud dang de la sogs pa'i 'od
NK036(chi)001:33: kyis steng 'og gang ba dang phyogs mtshams thams cad
NK036(chi)001:34: dang 'jig rten khams thams cad khyab par gyur pa
NK036(chi)001:35: dang de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal dang
NK036(chi)001:36: spyan ras gzigs dang phyag na rdo rje dang byams
NK036(chi)001:37: pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
NK036(chi)001:38: khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mgrin gcig tu
NK036(chi)001:39: bcom ldan 'das la thog ma'i sangs rgyas rnams dang
NK036(chi)001:40: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'i
NK036(chi)001:41: sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus
NK036(chi)001:42: shing lus pa med pa rnams dang rdo rje lu
NK036(chi)001:43: gu rgyud la brten nas sangs ji ltar rgya ba
NK036(chi)001:44: lags byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ye shes kyi
NK036(chi)001:45: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud
NK036(chi)001:46: la ji ltar bslab par bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyisabka'a
NK036(chi)001:47: stsal pa 'das pa'isangasa rgyas rnams kyis kyang rdo rje
NK036(chi)001:48: lu gu rgyud la brten nas sangs rgyas ma 'ongs
NK036(chi)001:49: pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rdo rje lu gu rgyud la
NK036(chi)001:50: brten nas sangs rgya bar 'gyur da ltar gyi sangs
NK036(chi)001:51: rgyas rnams kyang rdo rje lu gu rgyud la ma
NK036(chi)001:52: brten par sangs rgyas mi thob bo zhes gsungs pas
NK036(chi)001:53: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
NK036(chi)001:54: cad 'bras kyi zhing til gyi gong bu ltar sku
NK036(chi)001:55: mngon sum du gsal nas de de bzhin no zhes
NK036(chi)001:56: mgrin gcig tu gsungs so de na bcom ldan 'das
NK036(chi)001:57: kyis bka' stsal pa byang chub sem dpa' rnam dang
NK036(chi)001:58: khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa rnams dang
NK036(chi)001:59: rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams nyon cig skye ba
NK036(chi)001:60: gcig gis sangs rgya bar 'dod na lus ngag yid
NK036(chi)001:61: gsum gyis sku gsum gyi gzigs stangs dang ma bral
NK036(chi)001:62: bar gyis shig 'khor ba'i chos las 'das nas chos
NK036(chi)001:63: sku mngon sum du gyur bar 'dod na rdo rje
NK036(chi)001:64: lu gu rgyud kyi sku la ltos shig yang dag
NK036(chi)001:65: par rig pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'dod na rdo
NK036(chi)001:66: rje lu gu rgyud la ltos shig dmigs pa med
NK036(chi)001:67: pa nam mkha' lta bu'i don mthong bar 'dod na
NK036(chi)001:68: rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku dang zer la
NK036(chi)001:69: ltos shig 'bad rtsol med par 'gro ba'i don byed
NK036(chi)001:70: par 'dod na rdo rje lu gu rgyud la ltos
NK036(chi)001:71: shig skye 'chi med pa rdo rje'i lus thob par
NK036(chi)001:72: 'dod na rdo rje lu gu rgyud la ltos shig
NK036(chi)001:73: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid shes par
NK036(chi)001:74: 'dod na rdo rje lu gu rgyud la ltos shig
NK036(chi)001:75: chos thams cad kyi lta ba dang sgom pa dang
NK036(chi)001:76: spyod pa 'bras bu dbyer med par 'dod na rdo
NK036(chi)001:77: rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku la ltos shig snang
NK036(chi)001:78: ba thams cad snang med 'od gsal du 'char ba
NK036(chi)001:79: 'dod na yang rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku
NK036(chi)001:80: la ltos shig chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi
NK036(chi)001:81: ye shes rtogs par 'dod na yang rdo rje lu
NK036(chi)001:82: gu rgyud kyi sku la ltos shig spyan lnga thob
NK036(chi)001:83: par 'dod na yang rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi
NK036(chi)001:84: sku la ltos shig du ma med pa'i chos kyi
NK036(chi)001:85: sku thig le nyag gcig thob par 'dod na yang
NK036(chi)001:86: rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi ye shes kyi sku
NK036(chi)001:87: la ltos shig dbyings dang rig pa'i ye shes kyi
NK036(chi)001:88: don khong du chud par 'dod na yang rdo rje
NK036(chi)001:89: lu gu rgyud kyi sku la ltos shig yang dag
NK036(chi)001:90: pa'i sku dang zhing khams yongs su rdzogs par 'dod
NK036(chi)001:91: na yang rdo rje lu gu rgyudakyi sku la ltos
NK036(chi)001:92: shig 'khrigs pa dang 'gul ba dang 'khyug pa dang
NK036(chi)001:93: g.yo ba dang rang shar ba dang gsal ba'i zer
NK036(chi)001:94: la ltos shig rdo rje lu gu rgyud rang yin
NK036(chi)001:95: te gzhan du 'dzin pa med par ltos shig gsang
NK036(chi)001:96: ba sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lta bar 'dod na rdo
NK036(chi)001:97: rje lu gu rgyud la ltos shig dkyil 'khor gyi
NK036(chi)001:98: lha tshogs rnams lta bar 'dod na rdo rje lu
NK036(chi)001:99: gu rgyud kyi zer thag rnams la ltos shig kye
NK036(chi)001:100: rigs kyi bu rnams sangs rgyas kyi gzigs stangs kyis
NK036(chi)001:101: mi g.yo bar gzigs shig rang sangs rgyas kyi gzigs
NK036(chi)001:102: stangs kyi steng 'og tu gzigs shig nyan thos kyi
NK036(chi)001:103: gzigs stangs kyis zur la gzigs shig drang srong gi
NK036(chi)001:104: gzigs stangs kyis mtshams su gzigs shig de ltar rdo
NK036(chi)001:105: rje lu gu rgyud la phyogs bzhi mtshams rnams su
NK036(chi)001:106: rgya mtsho cog bzhag gi dgongs pas rnam rtog mi
NK036(chi)001:107: g.yo bar gzigs shig nam mkha' cog bzhag gis yid
NK036(chi)001:108: rtog pas mi g.yo bar gzigs shig ri bo cog
NK036(chi)001:109: bzhag gis gzigs stangs gsum dang mi 'bral bar gzigs
NK036(chi)001:110: shig de skad ces gsungs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK036(chi)001:111: khams thams cad 'ja' dang 'od du gyur kun tu
NK036(chi)001:112: bzang po'i 'od lnga'i tshom bu bye ba khrag khrig
NK036(chi)001:113: gis zhing khams thams cad gang bar gyur to de
NK036(chi)001:114: nas rdo rje sems dpas gdung ba'i smre sngags chen
NK036(chi)001:115: po bton nas 'jig rten ston pa sgron me ma
NK036(chi)001:116: bzhugs na 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i mun pa gang gis
NK036(chi)001:117: sel zhes gsungs pas rang byung gi yi ge shel
NK036(chi)001:118: gyi za ma tog dang bcas pa 'od kyi nang
NK036(chi)001:119: nas phyag g.yas pas bsnams pa gzigs pas zhing khams
NK036(chi)001:120: thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyang chos nyid mngon
NK036(chi)001:121: sum lu gu rgyud 'di la brten nas sangs rgyas
NK036(chi)001:122: par gzigs pas gdung ba sel bar gyur to rang
NK036(chi)001:123: byung gi yi ge 'di rig pa'i ye shes ston
NK036(chi)001:124: pa'i ston pa ste rtogs pas sangs rgyas su 'gyur
NK036(chi)001:125: ro bstan pa'i kha dog tu bris nas gang gi
NK036(chi)001:126: lus la btags pa de bar ma dor rang gi
NK036(chi)001:127: lus 'ja' 'od du 'gyur te tshom bu la thim
NK036(chi)001:128: nas skye ba gcig gis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
NK036(chi)001:129: mngon du 'gyur ro rang byung gi yi ge sangs
NK036(chi)001:130: rgyas bstan pa la bu gcig par gyur pa dpal
NK036(chi)001:131: kun tu bzang po'i phyag nas dpal rdo rje sems
NK036(chi)001:132: dpa'i phyag tu babs pa dga' ldan gnas kyi 'das
NK036(chi)001:133: rjes dang po'o rgya gar skad du bud+d+ha su kham
NK036(chi)001:134: ta a la ye te ka ra tan+t+ra d+hu yi
NK036(chi)001:135: na ma bod skad du dga' ldan gyi gnas sangs
NK036(chi)001:136: rgyas kyi zhal chems gnyis pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
NK036(chi)001:137: dpal gyi dpal rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal
NK036(chi)001:138: lo bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na phyogs
NK036(chi)001:139: bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byang chub sems dpa'
NK036(chi)001:140: bye ba khrag khriig rnams dang rdo rje'i rigs dang
NK036(chi)001:141: rin po che'i rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi
NK036(chi)001:142: rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma bye ba dang bcas pa
NK036(chi)001:143: rnams sprul pa'i mchod pa dpag tu med pa rnams
NK036(chi)001:144: kyis mchod nas bzhugs so de nas bcom ldan 'das
NK036(chi)001:145: glang po che'i gzigs stangs kyis chos nyid mngon sum
NK036(chi)001:146: du snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
NK036(chi)001:147: so de nas rdo rje sems dpa' stan la langs
NK036(chi)001:148: te kye kye ston pa kun tu bzang 'khor 'das
NK036(chi)001:149: ru shan ji ltar dbye sku gsum gzigs stangs ji
NK036(chi)001:150: ltar bya chos nyid mngon sum ji ltar gsal skye
NK036(chi)001:151: 'chi bar do ji ltar bzung bdag cag kun la
NK036(chi)001:152: bshad du gsol legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod
NK036(chi)001:153: kye kye kye ho rigs kyi bu 'khor 'das ru
NK036(chi)001:154: shan 'di ltar dbye 'gro drug lus kyi spyod pa
NK036(chi)001:155: brtsam lus kyi 'dzin pa dag pa na lus kyi
NK036(chi)001:156: ru shan byed pa yin 'gro drug ngag gis skad
NK036(chi)001:157: rnams brtsam brjod med dag la gnas pa na ngag
NK036(chi)001:158: gi ru shan phyed pa yin 'gro drug yid kyi
NK036(chi)001:159: bsam pa brtsam a bsam du med pa rtogs pa
NK036(chi)001:160: na yid kyi ru shan phyed pa yin kye kye
NK036(chi)001:161: kye ho rigs kyi bu mya ngan 'das pa'i rjes
NK036(chi)001:162: su chos kyi sku seng ge lta bu'i gzigs stangs
NK036(chi)001:163: la mkhas par gyis shig tshom bu lnga lnga bye
NK036(chi)001:164: ba khrag khrig gi dgongs pa mngon du gsal bar
NK036(chi)001:165: 'gyur ro tshom bu lnga lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga'i
NK036(chi)001:166: dgongs pa'i mngon du gsal lo longs sku glang po
NK036(chi)001:167: che'i gzigs stangs la mkhas par gyis shig tshom bu
NK036(chi)001:168: lnga lnga bye ba khrag khrig gi dgongs pa mngon
NK036(chi)001:169: du gsal bar 'gyur ro sprul pa'i sku drang srong
NK036(chi)001:170: gi gzigs stangs la mkhas par gyis shig 'bad rtsol
NK036(chi)001:171: med pa'i snying rjes 'gro ba rnams dang mi phyed
NK036(chi)001:172: pa cig 'char bar 'gyur ro kye kye rigs kyi
NK036(chi)001:173: bu nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su mi
NK036(chi)001:174: med pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa rang
NK036(chi)001:175: gi sems la 'char bas chos nyid mngon sum du
NK036(chi)001:176: 'od dang 'od kyi 'ja' dang thig le mu khyud
NK036(chi)001:177: dang tshom bu gcig pa'i mu khyud dang tshom bu
NK036(chi)001:178: gnyis pa'i mu khyud dang tshom bu gsum pa'i mu
NK036(chi)001:179: khyud dang / tshom bu bzhi pa'i mu khyud dang
NK036(chi)001:180: tshom bu lnga pa'i mu khyud dang tshom bu'i nang
NK036(chi)001:181: du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal dang phyed sku dang
NK036(chi)001:182: sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang gdan khri dang tshom
NK036(chi)001:183: bu 'char ba ltar gsal bar 'gyur ro kye kye
NK036(chi)001:184: rigs kyi bu nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes
NK036(chi)001:185: su rigs kyi bus lus dben sems dben pa ngag
NK036(chi)001:186: mi smra ba chos nyid mngon sum rdo rje lu
NK036(chi)001:187: gu rgyud la skyong bas 'od kyi 'aja'i nang du
NK036(chi)001:189: tshom bu gnyis pa dang tshom bu gsum pa dang
NK036(chi)001:190: tshom bu bzhi pa dang tshom bu gang mngon du
NK036(chi)001:191: gyur pa'i 'phro la 'chi ba'i dus byas na bar
NK036(chi)001:192: do dang po la skye shi'i bar dor gang gsal
NK036(chi)001:193: ba'i tshom bu nam mkha'i dkyil du mthong bar 'gyur
NK036(chi)001:194: ro tshom bu rang gi snying gar zug pa snyam
NK036(chi)001:195: byed pa'i dus su lus med kyang yod par 'dzin
NK036(chi)001:196: pa dang de'i dus su nam mkha'i tshom bu la
NK036(chi)001:197: lus gnas par gyis la lus yid la ma byed
NK036(chi)001:198: cig de bzhin du tshom bu gnyis pa dang gsum
NK036(chi)001:199: pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa
NK036(chi)001:200: gang nam mkha' la shar ba'i dus su sems la
NK036(chi)001:201: zhog cig de bzhin du lus yid la ma byed
NK036(chi)001:202: cig tshom bu zhag grangs su gnas te bcu tshan
NK036(chi)001:203: lnga'i zhag la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob par
NK036(chi)001:204: 'gyur ro zhes gsungs nas dpal kun tu bzang po'i
NK036(chi)001:205: sku mi snang bar 'od du gyur nas rdo rje
NK036(chi)001:206: sems dpas gdung ba'i smre sngags bton pas phyag g.yas
NK036(chi)001:207: pa 'od kyi nang nas shel gyi za ma tog
NK036(chi)001:208: gi nang du rang byung gi yi ge 'di rdo
NK036(chi)001:209: rje sems dpa'i phyag tu babs so sangs rgyas bstan
NK036(chi)001:210: pa'i mi la rang byung gi yi ge bstan pas
NK036(chi)001:211: bstan pa'i bu gcig tu gyur to dga' ldan gyi
NK036(chi)001:212: gnas kyi sangs kyi 'das rjes gnyis pa'o rgya gar
NK036(chi)001:213: skad du su kha b+aa ti bud+d+ha de ka ra
NK036(chi)001:214: t+ai ni tan+t+ra na ma bod skad du dga' ldan
NK036(chi)001:215: gyi gnas su sangs rgyas kyi zhal chems gsum pa'i
NK036(chi)001:216: rgyud ces bya ba dpal gyi dpal rnam par snang
NK036(chi)001:217: mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan
NK036(chi)001:218: lha'i gnas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams lus pa
NK036(chi)001:219: med pa'i zhing gi byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
NK036(chi)001:220: khrag khrig me tog dang mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu
NK036(chi)001:221: med pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing drang srong
NK036(chi)001:222: lta bu'i gzigs stangs kyis bzhugs so gzhan yang mkha'
NK036(chi)001:223: 'gro ma bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pas
NK036(chi)001:224: bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas drang srong lta bu'i
NK036(chi)001:226: de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong lta bu'i gzigs
NK036(chi)001:227: stang kyis chos nyid mngon sum du snang ba'i ting
NK036(chi)001:228: nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so de nas rdo
NK036(chi)001:229: rje sems dpa' stan las langs te kye kye ston
NK036(chi)001:230: pa kun tu bzang chos nyid rdo rje lug gu
NK036(chi)001:231: rgyud skyong ba'i gnas ji lta bu lus ngag ji
NK036(chi)001:232: lta bu smin pa'i tshad ji ltar lags smin tshad
NK036(chi)001:233: 'bras bu ji ltar thob bdag cag rnams la bstan
NK036(chi)001:234: du gsol legs so rdo rje sems dpa' nyon rab
NK036(chi)001:235: ni mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i gnas 'bring ni ri bo'i
NK036(chi)001:236: spo mthon dbus tha ma sgron ma shar snga'i gnas
NK036(chi)001:237: der ni mngon sum bskyang bar bya lus ni mis
NK036(chi)001:238: mi mthong bar bya ngag ni mi smra bcad par
NK036(chi)001:239: bya yid ni rnam rtog 'gyu sgo bkag kye kye
NK036(chi)001:240: nam mkha' sprin bral la gzigs stangs gsum po gang
NK036(chi)001:241: rung gis smin mtshams ya phibs sor bzhi la 'od
NK036(chi)001:242: dang 'od kyi 'phro 'du lha mu khyud tshom bu
NK036(chi)001:243: gcig pa dang mu khyud tshom bu gnyis pa dang
NK036(chi)001:244: mu khyud tshom bu gsum pa dang mu khyud tshom
NK036(chi)001:245: bu bzhi pa dang mu khyud tshom bu lnga pa
NK036(chi)001:246: ni dang po smin pa'i tshad du bya kye kye
NK036(chi)001:247: smin tshad gnyis pa ni mu khyung dang po lnga
NK036(chi)001:248: pa la zhal ni gtsug tor ldan pa 'char mu
NK036(chi)001:249: khyud thig le lnga pa la gtsug tor zhal ni
NK036(chi)001:250: phye par 'char kye kye smin tshad gsum pa ni
NK036(chi)001:251: mu khyud thig le lnga pa la bde gshegs sprul
NK036(chi)001:252: pa'i rigs lnga ni ngur smrig chos gos phyag rgyas
NK036(chi)001:253: mdzes rang nyid rigs lnga'i zhing khams su gong du
NK036(chi)001:254: longs sku thob gyur pa de yi kha dog rigs
NK036(chi)001:255: gcig pas sprul pa'i rigs lnga kha dog gsal de
NK036(chi)001:256: ni smin pa'i tshad yin no kye kye smin tshad
NK036(chi)001:257: 'bras bu thob pa ni sku las phung po bsnyil
NK036(chi)001:258: dus su de dus bar do dang po la nam
NK036(chi)001:259: mkha' dag la tshom bu lnga bde gshegs sprul pa
NK036(chi)001:260: lnga ru gsal 'di yi 'od dang bdag snying 'brel
NK036(chi)001:261: de dus tshom bu bde gshegs la ma pang bu
NK036(chi)001:262: ltar rig pa bzhag zhag gsum tshom bu nyid la
NK036(chi)001:263: gnas 'ja' lus rigs lnga bdag gyur nas byang chub
NK036(chi)001:264: sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la sku dang mdzad pas chos
NK036(chi)001:265: gsung ngo zhes gsungs nas sku 'od phung du gyur
NK036(chi)001:266: nas mi snang bar gyur pa'i dus su rdo rje
NK036(chi)001:267: sems dpas gdung ba'i smre ngag bton pas bcom ldan
NK036(chi)001:268: 'das kyi phyag g.yas pa'i 'od kyi nang nas shel
NK036(chi)001:269: gyi za ma tog gi nang du rang byung gi
NK036(chi)001:270: yi ge 'di rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag tu babs
NK036(chi)001:271: so rang byung gi yi ge 'di bstan pas kha
NK036(chi)001:272: dog tu bee d+aur+ya zhun ma la bris te rigs
NK036(chi)001:273: kyi bu gang gis btags pa des sangs rgya bar
NK036(chi)001:274: 'gyur ro rigs kyi bu gang gis thos pa de
NK036(chi)001:275: sangs rgyas la nye bar 'gyur ro rigs kyi bu
NK036(chi)001:276: gang gis mthong ba de dad par 'gyur ro rigs
NK036(chi)001:277: kyi bu gang dang gang gis bris pa dang bklags
NK036(chi)001:278: pa dang bcangs pas gang dang phrad par gyur pa'i
NK036(chi)001:279: sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams
NK036(chi)001:280: cad las grol nas sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro dga'
NK036(chi)001:281: ldan gnas kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gsum pa'i
NK036(chi)001:282: rgyud rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag tu babs pa rdzogs
